mapper.select: /* getListSdoExceptGeom */ SELECT A.bjcd, A.sd_code AS sdo_code, A.koname FROM sk_sdo A, ( SELECT MIN(ogc_fid) AS ogc_fid, koname FROM sk_sdo WHERE enable_yn ='Y' GROUP BY koname ) B WHERE A.ogc_fid = B.ogc_fid

/* getListSggBySdoExceptGeom */ SELECT B.bjcd, B.sd_code AS sdo_code, B.sgg_code, B.koname FROM sk_sgg B, ( SELECT MIN(A.ogc_fid) AS ogc_fid, A.code AS bjcd, A.koname FROM ( SELECT ogc_fid, bjcd as code, koname FROM sk_sgg WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND bjcd LIKE #{sidoCd} || '%' ) A GROUP BY A.code, A.koname ) C WHERE B.ogc_fid = C.ogc_fid

/* getListEmdBySdoAndSggExceptGeom */ SELECT B.bjcd, B.sd_code AS sdo_code, B.sgg_code AS sgg_code, B.emd_code AS emd_code, B.koname FROM sk_emd B, ( SELECT MIN(A.ogc_fid) AS ogc_fid, A.code AS bjcd, A.koname FROM ( SELECT ogc_fid, emd_code as code, koname FROM sk_emd WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND bjcd LIKE #{sdoCode} || #{sggCode} ||'%' ) A GROUP BY A.code, A.koname ) C WHERE B.ogc_fid = C.ogc_fid ORDER BY C.koname

/* getDistrictTotalCount */ SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT koname FROM sk_sdo WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND koname ilike '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT koname FROM sk_sgg WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND koname ilike '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT koname FROM sk_emd WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND koname ilike '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ) A

/* getListDistrict */ SELECT bjcd AS id, koname, ST_X(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS latitude FROM sk_sdo WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND koname ILIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT B.bjcd AS id, A.koname||' ' || B.koname, ST_X(ST_Centroid(B.wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(B.wkb_geometry)) AS latitude FROM sk_sgg B LEFT JOIN sk_sdo A on A.sd_code = B.sd_code WHERE B.enable_yn = 'Y' AND B.koname ILIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT C.bjcd AS id, A.koname||' ' || B.koname ||' '|| C.koname, ST_X(ST_Centroid(C.wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(C.wkb_geometry)) AS latitude FROM sk_emd C LEFT JOIN sk_sdo A on A.sd_code = C.sd_code LEFT JOIN sk_sgg B on B.bjcd = SUBSTR(C.bjcd,1,5) WHERE C.enable_yn = 'Y' AND C.koname Ilike '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ORDER BY koname OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
